content.description: Steep bouldery start leads to a striped ice cream scoop ledge.  Climb up into to a dihedral with a very shallow crack.
content.protection: 6-9 bolts plus a two bolt traditional anchor
content.location: See picture for description.  Climb is on its own 30-40 paces right of Mods, Mocker and Mocker.

content.description: Really fun moves with a slabby crux around bolt 5.  Wasp nest in cave left of bolt 4 as of Feb '21, so stay right to avoid stings.  Easy terrain up top.
content.protection: 8 bolts plus two bolt anchor with rap rings
content.location: See picture for location.  Left most of three close routes.  Climbs to the right of a bulbous cave feature.

content.description: Sandwiched between Touch and Go and Frozen Spark, this climb is a little overgrown as of March 2021.
content.protection: 7-9 bolts plus a two bolt traditional anchor

content.description: Tall moderate climb that could use a pair of loppers and a hand saw to clean out some over grown vegetation as of March 2021.
content.protection: 8 bolts plus two bolt anchor with chains
content.location: See picture for location.  Between Mods and Mocker.

content.description: Slightly run out moderate face climb that moves up the face to the right of a huge cave.
content.protection: 5 bolts plus a two bolt anchor with chains
content.location: Left most route about twenty or thirty paces down from Touch and Go, Shake N' Flake and Frozen Spark.  See picture.

content.description: Really fun moderate climb.  A great warm up that is pretty tall.  Bolted crack after an initial bulge crux move down low.  Climb out the left side of the cave 75% of the way up and then trend right on the upper face to the anchors.
content.protection: 9 bolts plus two bolt anchor with chains

content.description: Really fun climb!  Stay right of bolt four and continue up to an overhanging section near the top of the climb.  Rest on underclings before pulling the bulge (crux) and arrive at the anchors.
content.protection: 8 bolts plus a two bolt anchor with chains
content.location: Right most route of the three climbs in this area (Mods, Rockers to its' immediate left).  See picture.

content.description: Start to the right on big features to the first bolt, vear right and climb the bolt line just left of the dihedral corner.  Rest on the ledge 80% of the way up, pull the roof and climb to the anchors.
content.protection: 7-9 bolts plus two bolt traditional anchor
content.location: Right most of the three climbs very close together (Touch N Go and Shake N Bake immediately to the left)

content.description: At the end of the painted canyon sector is a collection of obscurely named routes.  This loose assortment of routes includes a few moderates ranging from 5.9 to 5.11.
